extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: So...\. I'm just supposed to lay down in the bed?
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: Donc...\. Je suis juste censé me coucher dans le lit ?

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: And I'll just...\. fall asleep?
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: Et je vais juste...\. m'endormir ?

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: [nods]
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: [acquiesce]

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: What a weird concept.
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: Quel curieux concept.

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: So... and what are you doing here?\. Following me up to my bedroom at such an hour?
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: Et... qu'est-ce que tu viens faire ici ?\. Dans ma chambre à une heure si tardive ?

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: Have any ulterior motives?
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: Tu as une autre idée en tête ?

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: Sorry!
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: Désolée !

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: Gyahahaha!\. I'm just joking, Lea!
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: Gyahahaha !\. C'était pour rire, Lea !

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: Hi!
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: Salut !

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: Hey Lea!
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: Hé, Lea !

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: Nothing special going on here...\. just watching the news.
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: Je fais rien de particulier ici...\. Je regarde juste les news.

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: Feel free to join me!
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: Si tu veux, tu peux les regarder avec moi !

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: I appreciate that they gave us access to some of the broadcasting services.
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: J'apprécie qu'ils nous aient donné accès à quelques bouquets de chaînes.
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.note: does the formal vocabulary comes from rundfunkdienst ?

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: It's at least something to spend the time with.
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: Au moins ça permet de passer le temps.

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: [nods]
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: [acquiesce]

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: And strangely...\. it's still pretty interesting to watch the news.
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: Et étrangement...\. Ça reste assez intéressant de regarder les journaux.

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: Even though it feels a bit pointless...
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: Même si ça semble un peu absurde...

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: Why?
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: Pourquoi ?

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: I mean...\. I don't think it's all that relevant to us what's happening out there.
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: Je veux dire...\. Je pense pas que ça nous concerne en quoi que ce soit, ce qui se passe dehors.

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: Unless they'd have breaking news of Instatainment declaring bankruptcy.
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: Sauf s'ils annoncent subitement que Instatainment déclare faillite.

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: Japp, that would be bad news to us...
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: Japp, ça serait une mauvaise nouvelle pour nous...

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: Actually...\. if you think about it, hasn't it always been this way?
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: D'ailleurs...\. Quand on y pense, est-ce que ça n'a pas toujours été comme ça ?

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: What?
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: Quoi ?

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: Like... hasn't most news been rather irrelevant to our life, even back when we were outside of the game?
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: Je veux dire... La plupart des news sont assez inutiles pour notre vie de tous les jours, non ? Même avant qu'on soit dans le jeu.

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: You know, unless it's something happening in your town or a global catastrophe.
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: Tu sais, sauf si c'est quelque chose qui se passe dans ta ville ou une catastrophe globale.

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: It certainly doesn't make you stop worrying about whatever is happening out there in the world.
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: En tout cas ça nous empêche pas de s'inquiéter de ce qui se passe dans le monde de dehors.

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: Bye!
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: Bye !

extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.orig: Got enough news for today?\. Have a nice evening, then!
extension/post-game/data/maps/evo-villag.text: Tu as eu assez de news pour aujourd'hui ?\. Passe une bonne soirée, alors !
